name: ephebic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to or like an ephebe (= a young man, especially in Ancient Greece, or a young person who is not yet a fully grown adult): He plays an ephebic character, a young man who has not quite reached adulthood. The gymnast wore a leotard that showed his slender, ephebic physique. Ephebic training was the last stage in Athenian education.
